taxon.author: (Deeleman-Reinhold, 1986)
taxon.distribution: Thailand, Malaysia (mainland, Borneo), Indonesia (Sumatra, Borneo), Singapore

referenceObject.reference: Deeleman-Reinhold, C. L. (1986a). Studies on tropical Pholcidae II: Redescription of Micromerys gracilis Bradley and Calapnita vermiformis Simon (Araneae, Pholcidae) and description of some related new species. Memoirs of the Queensland Museum 22: 205-224.
